description:
Calling all engineering students! If you’re in the market for a laptop that can handle resource-intensive coursework, you’ve come to the right place. These laptops offer reliable performance as well as a portable form factor, which is important for when you’re running from class to class. We’ve also included budget-friendly machines and gaming rigs for those late night gaming sessions. Read on to learn more.

Why you should trust us: Hey, it’s in our name! PCWorld prides itself on laptop experience and expertise. We’ve been covering PCs since 1983, and now review more than 70 laptops every year. All of the picks below have been personally tested and vetted by our experts, who’ve applied not only performance benchmarks but rigorous usability standards. We’re also committed to r
title: Best laptops for engineering students 2024: Expert picks and advice

description:
Want to level up your career in 2024? Or maybe you have a company and want to save on hiring for IT support. If you’re interested in IT, now’s the time to take advantage of a big discount on The Complete 2024 CompTIA Certification Training Super Bundle by IDUNOVA. This extensive bundle includes training to help you pass 15 CompTIA certification exams and it’s on sale for an extra $15 off through January 28.

title: Reduce IT costs in 2024 with $15 off this CompTIA super bundle

description:
It can be easy to burn through lesser-made electronics in a matter of years. Though higher-quality brands do last longer, they also come with a much higher price tag. However, they can also be cleaned, inspected, and turned into new-to-you devices with many of the same features as a new one — like this refurbished Apple MacBook Air 13.3″. It’s only from 2017, so it’s not very old, and it’s on sale through January 28 for just $369.99 (reg. $1,199).

title: Get a 2017 MacBook Air for $369.99 — only through 1/28
